prefix1_description: **The prefix limit is only two characters**
djrank4_description: **This rank does not exist or was not found !**
djrank6_description: **The option** `djrank` **is not enabled, please enable this option before you can perform this action.**
other1_description: **You don't have permission to do this.**
other2_description: **Incorrect syntax, visit our [documentation](https://docs.flazebot.com/features/settings-commands) for more informations.**
other3_description:
%1settings prefix
%1settings djrank (None)
%1settings info
%1settings language (en/fr/pt)
%1settings deleteafter (None)
%1settings restricted_channels (disable)
deleteafter2_description: **The specified argument is not correct. Please enter a valid number.**
deleteafter3_description: **The specified argument must be between 1 and 300 seconds or 'None'.**
restricted_channels6_description: You cannot do this at the moment
restricted_channels7_description: Please specify the number of restricted channels you want.
restricted_channels10_description: The channel could not be found.
restricted_channels12_description:
Do you want a message to be sent if a command is executed in a channel other than the restricted_channels? Answer by `True` (Yes) or `False` (No)
Type `cancel` to exit.
restricted_channels14_description:
**Please specify your 'Restricted Channel' (ID, name or mention)
Type `cancel` to exit.**
restricted_channels18_description:
**Please specify your 'Restricted Channel' number `%1` (ID or name)
Type `cancel` to exit.**
restricted_channels20_description: **You cannot send commands in this channel.**
